相比前作，场景与剧情变得更加宏大，隐藏在精妙谜题下的v社宇宙被逐渐揭开。

One of the best games I've ever played in my entire life! :D

my brain before i played this game = .

Greatest game I've ever played. No other way of saying it, from the atmosphere to the music to the extremely satisfying portal mechanics, to the jokes and to the beautiful way the game looks, even 8 years later. It is genuinely my favourite thing when I can connect my path flight with a portal, to make a seamless landing on an area. Not to mention how satisfying it is to finish a hard test. The tests are hard, but easy enough to stop you from looking to a guide, and to top it all off, when it goes on sale, it costs nothing. If you never played this game, P L A Y  I T 
 N O W.

Portal 2 revolves around some girl that has shoes with mad arch support, trying to navigate her way through the Aperature Labs guided by the australian bakugon, Wheatley. He tries to help you leave but the mad dom, GladOs, who is the ultimate top, tries to prevent this by providing puzzles for you to solve. It's a fun game, by far tho GladOs' ultra fucking sadist personality is even better when she goes Potato. 10/10 would fuck Wheatley.

This is a game that make me surprised. I even hate this game when my friend recommended it to me. But now I really would like to play it. I played it for 10 hours. 
After 1 year:
PORTAL 2? Masterpiece!
Nothing to say about Portal 2. That's a kind of expression of Valve
The only downside to this game is it's short
Портальная игра круто то что есть кооператив РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!

Ayuda a mantener la mente ágil a través de sus mapas que desafían el ingenio y (en cooperativo) requieren coordinación y trabajo en equipo de calidad
Fun puzzles that increase in difficulty; snarky humorous commentary from crazy AI.  I played this when it first came out and I am enjoying it just as much the second time around.

Portal 1 but with a higher budget and some of the most compelling puzzle design and writing. This is a must own for any PC player. It has held up so well since it was released nearly 10 years ago now on all fronts like graphics, story, puzzles, and like portal 1 can run on almost any PC or Laptop made in the last decade. Just get it.
非常好的游戏，这个游戏讲述了一个机器人工厂的故事。虽然本质上是一个解密游戏，但这些机器人都有自己的感情，导致结局的时候反而像一个感人的朋友之间的故事

This game is a strategy and puzzle game where you must navigate through a underground facility filled with robots, i mean i have played this game for three hours with my friend and boy can i tell ya its fun with friends


                                                                 Like GLaDOs XD!
Classic game completely timeless and amazingly funny. everyone should have this game. Clearly ahead of its time.

bom d+. fiquei tonto jogando esse jogo
great story and fun, but be ready for a headache on some levels

Not much for me to say about this game that hasn't been said a million times by millions of critics. this game is a certifiable masterpiece and pioneer for the puzzle game genre. few have come close to the ingenuity and creativity of this classic valve puzzle game. definite purchase for anybody new or old in the PC gaming community. Unlike the walking dead: saints and sinners, which i would have preferred never buying.
it's a good game for passing time. takes a lot of time to finsh

Oh my god! This game is LEGENDNARY!!!! I loved this so much, unfortunately I completed it in one day, but GOD is it SO WORTH THE 10 BUCKS!!!!! Amazing gameplay, wonderful unique plot, and there's twists and turns everywhere, the first portal was really awesome, BUT OH MY GOD IS THIS THE GREATEST SEQUEL IN THE UNIVERSE! Thank you valve, and DO PLAY customers!
наверное лучшее во что я играл за свою жизнь, прошёл за 15 часов, без перерыва, уж настолько она мне понравилась

Probably one of the most hilarious games ever made along with being an absolutely stellar single player and co-op experience. Highly recommend.

Excelente historia, excelente ambientación. Una gran continuación del proyecto que resultó ser el Portal 1. Un juego de ingenio que sentó las bases para un nuevo género de juegos por originalidad. A pesar de tener varios años es un juego que sigue vigente, gracias a la comunidad que logra crear nuevas cámaras desde el Workshop.
This game is really fun, the humor is bittersweet and the puzzles are tricky sometimes... Can only recommend it.
Incredibly funny, fun and amusing. Has some very fun puzzles, a great story and is really great to play with your friends.

Très bon jeu, un bonne durée de vie en solo, sans compter le multi qui propose des maps du workshop.De très bon graphismes, une difficulté bien géré.Bref un très bon pour réflechir en solo comme en co-op

17/20

simplesmente não tem muito o que falar sobre essa lindeza de jogo. apenas compre e divirta-se. o melhor puzzle já feito. aproveite a promoção, vale muito a pena. a glados e o weathley são carismáticos demais. faz até você querer ter um amigo robô.
a campanha co-op também é sem palavras, divertida e desafiadora. chama um amigo e vira a noite jogando. horas e horas de diversão garantida.
nice game but kinda difficult if you have a 10 iq poo brain like me
This is an amazing game, i absolutely love it. The storyline as well as the humour so cleverly placed in the story is just top notch, i highly reccomend trying this game. worth my money

Faaaaantastic. 142/10. Would recommend to everyone, you can't die without having played the Portal games. Pick up the bundle, as of 30 June 2020, both games together are only $3 USD. G E T  I I I I I T
Легендарная головоломка, ни дать, ни взять. И интересная одиночка, и неплохой кооп. Прекрасно играется даже спустя столько лет.
Beat both Portal 1 and 2 in a couple days and only wish I got the games sooner. It has a great story with great puzzles that make you think and I definitely recommend.
